name: The Undiscovered Crete and its flavors
description: In this adventure you discover Crete through the lence of a traveler, rather than a tourist. You explore culinary aspects of Crete through the flavors of the local diet and cuisine, while at the same time you discover true Crete. Hands on Cooking experience, olive oil tasting, cheese tasting and social interaction with the locals in a non touristic area of Crete are only a few of the characteristics of this triip.  Taste, experience and explore one of the most majestic islands in the world!!
